en.title: FE at Joey Yap's National Feng Shui Congress 2008!
en.content:
REPORT FROM FE LEADER RENA CHONG

Renowned Feng Shui Master and Author Joey Yap's National Feng Shui Congress 2008 was held on 13th and 14th September 2008 at Kuala Lumpur Convention Centre. FE participated as one of the anchor exhibitors at the exhibition hall during the 2 day Congress attended by participants and visitors from various countries. FE's Quantum Science products were very well received and we generated sales and lots of leads from the participants and visitors. Joey Yap himself was fascinated and amazed by the Quantum Pendant when we did the balancing and handphone demos on him. Below are some of the photos taken during the 2 day exhibition and the demos performed in Joey.

(Note: FE thank Rena Chong, Maggie Loo, Raymond, Samuel and team for a wonderful job done! Keep it up!)
